### All Submissions

- [ ] Have you followed our guidelines?
- [ ] Have you checked to ensure there aren't other open [Pull Requests](../../pulls) for the same update/change?

### New API Endpoints

- [ ] Is it a _public_ API endpoint that you want to implement?
- [ ] Did you follow other API endpoint implementations?
- [ ] Did you cover it with test(s)?
- [ ] Did you documented it in the [read me](https://github.com/emartech/suite-js-sdk/blob/main/README.md)?
- [ ] Did you link the Emarsys Developer Hub?
